DOC.brief_summary: This is a one-period, double-blind, single-center pharmacokinetic study of linezolid in patients with MDR or XDR tuberculosis treated with linezolid and an Optimized Background Therapy (defined as treatment with > 4 drugs with activity against tuberculosis to which the patient's isolate is believed to be sensitive by history or based on drug sensitivity testing).
DOC.brief_title: Linezolid Pharmacokinetics (PK) in Multi-Drug Resistant (MDR)/Extensively-Drug Resistant (XDR) Tuberculosis (TB)
DOC.detailed_description: This is a one-period, double-blind, single-center pharmacokinetic study of linezolid in patients with MDR or XDR tuberculosis treated with linezolid and an Optimized Background Therapy (defined as treatment with > 4 drugs with activity against tuberculosis to which the patient's isolate is believed to be sensitive by history or based on drug sensitivity testing).
DOC.criteria: Enrolled in the TBTC Study 30 Provision of informed consent for the study Severe anemia as defined by a hematocrit less than 25% (most recent value, measured within 30 days of the PK study).
